entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:04 AM CDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 5:04 AM CDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 early in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:04 AM CDT Monday 3 April 2023
